entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who roars over the hubbub in the kitchen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone Moody is talking to.

entities.name: dedalus
entities.description: Dedalus is mentioned as a person who probably told Harry about abandoning Plan A.

entities.name: pius thicknesse
entities.description: Pius Thicknesse is introduced as someone who has gone over and made it an imprisonable offense to connect the house to the Floo Network or Apparate in or out.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as a person that Pius Thicknesse is trying to prevent from getting in at Harry.

entities.name: the floo network
entities.description: The Floo Network is introduced as something that has been made an imprisonable offense to connect to.

relationships.description: Moody roared over the hubbub and turned to Harry, indicating that he is speaking to him.
Pius Thicknesse made it an imprisonable offense to connect the house to the Floo Network or Apparate in or out, indicating that he is trying to prevent You-Know-Who from getting in at Harry.
